description: This jar contains raw milk separating into cream.  You can seal up the jar once the process is completed.

use_action.msg: You examine the batch and see that the cream has risen to the top, so you seal the jar up for storage.
use_action.not_ready_msg: The cream has not risen yet.

description: Sweet, sweet sugar in the process of crystallizing.  It needs two weeks to form solid crystals.

use_action.msg: You break up the crystallized sugar into a coarse powder.
use_action.//: 2 weeks for cristallizing sugar, based on the real-life example

description: This jar contains a batch of eggs in a pickling solution.  You can seal up the jar once the process is completed.

use_action.msg: You examine the batch and see that the pickling solution has done its job, so you seal the jar up for storage.
use_action.not_ready_msg: The eggs are not done yet.

description: A sealed jar holding sanitized yeast wort.  You may harvest the yeast inside when it's done culturing.

use_action.msg: You open the jar and harvest the culture.
use_action.not_ready_msg: The yeast isn't done culturing yet.

description: This jar contains a batch of pickles set to ferment.  You can seal up the jar once the process is completed.

use_action.msg: You test the batch, and it tastes good, so you seal the jar up for storage.
use_action.not_ready_msg: The pickles are not done fermenting yet.
use_action.//: 2 1/3 days, from the suggested recipe of 1 rl week

description: This jar contains a batch of sauerkraut set to ferment.  You can seal up the jar once the process is completed.

use_action.msg: You test the batch, and it tastes good, so you seal the jar up for storage.
use_action.not_ready_msg: The sauerkraut isn't done fermenting yet.
use_action.//: 2 1/3 days, from the suggested recipe of 1 rl week
